member.name: T:HarSharp.Browser
member.summary: Contains information about the browser that created the log.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Creator
member.summary: Contains information about the log creator application.

member.name: T:HarSharp.EntityBase
member.summary: A base class for all HAR entities.

member.name: P:HarSharp.EntityBase.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets a comment provided by the user or the application.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Creator.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Creator.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Cache
member.summary: Contains information about a request coming from browser cache.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cache.BeforeRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of a cache entry before the request.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cache.AfterRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of a cache entry after the request.

member.name: T:HarSharp.CacheState
member.summary: Represents a cache state.

member.name: P:HarSharp.CacheState.Expires
member.summary: Gets or sets the expiration time of the cache entry.

member.name: P:HarSharp.CacheState.LastAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets the last time the cache entry was opened.

member.name: P:HarSharp.CacheState.ETag
member.summary: Gets or sets the ETag.

member.name: P:HarSharp.CacheState.HitCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times the cache entry has been opened.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Content
member.summary: Describes details about response content.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Content.Size
member.summary:
Gets or sets the length of the returned content in bytes.
Should be equal to response.BodySize if there is no compression and bigger when the content has been compressed.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Content.Compression
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bytes saved.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Content.MimeType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the MIME type of the response text (value of the Content-Type response header).
The charset attribute of the MIME type is included (if available).

member.name: P:HarSharp.Content.Text
member.summary:
Gets or sets the response body sent from the server or loaded from the browser cache.
This field is populated with textual content only. The text field is either HTTP decoded text or a encoded (e.g. "base64") representation of the response body.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Content.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding used for response text field.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Cookie
member.summary: Represents a HTTP cookie.

member.name: T:HarSharp.ParameterBase
member.summary: A base class for parameters.

member.name: P:HarSharp.ParameterBase.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name.

member.name: P:HarSharp.ParameterBase.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cookie.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the path pertaining to the cookie.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cookie.Domain
member.summary: Gets or sets the host of the cookie.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cookie.Expires
member.summary: Gets or sets the cookie expiration time.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cookie.HttpOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is HTTP only.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Cookie.Secure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it was transmitted over SSL.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Entry
member.summary: Represents one exported (tracked) HTTP request.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.PageRef
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference to the parent page.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.StartedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of the request start.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Time
member.summary:
Gets or sets the total elapsed time of the request in milliseconds.
This is the sum of all timings available in the timings object.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Request
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed info about the request.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Response
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed info about the response.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Cache
member.summary: Gets or sets the info about cache usage.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Timings
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed timing info about request/response round trip.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.ServerIPAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of the server that was connected (result of DNS resolution).

member.name: P:HarSharp.Entry.Connection
member.summary:
Gets or sets the Unique ID of the parent TCP/IP connection, can be the client port number.
Note that a port number doesn't have to be unique identifier in cases where the port is shared for more connections. If the port isn't available for the application, any other unique connection ID can be used instead (e.g. connection index).

member.name: T:HarSharp.Har
member.summary: Represents a HAR - HTTP Archive Format.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Har.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets the root object.

member.name: T:HarSharp.HarConvert
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between HTTP Archive Format (HAR) and HAR entities.

member.name: M:HarSharp.HarConvert.Deserialize(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize HAR content to a HAR entity.
member.param: The HAR content to be deserialized.

member.name: M:HarSharp.HarConvert.DeserializeFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize a HAR file to a HAR entity.
member.param: The HAR file name to be deserialized.

member.name: M:HarSharp.HarConvert.TransformPartialRedirectUrlToFull(HarSharp.Har)
member.summary: Transform the partial redirect URL to a full one.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Header
member.summary: Represents a HTTP header.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Log
member.summary: Represents the root of the HAR data.

member.name: M:HarSharp.Log.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Log.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version number of the format.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Log.Creator
member.summary: Gets or sets the log creator application.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Log.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the user agent.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Log.Pages
member.summary: Gets the pages.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Log.Entries
member.summary: Gets the entries.

member.name: T:HarSharp.MessageBase
member.summary: A base class for HTTP messages.

member.name: M:HarSharp.MessageBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HarSharp.MessageBase.HttpVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP Version.

member.name: P:HarSharp.MessageBase.Cookies
member.summary: Gets the list of cookie objects.

member.name: P:HarSharp.MessageBase.Headers
member.summary: Gets the list of header objects.

member.name: P:HarSharp.MessageBase.HeadersSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of bytes from the start of the HTTP request message until (and including) the double CRLF before the body.

member.name: P:HarSharp.MessageBase.BodySize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the request body (POST data payload) in bytes.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Page
member.summary: Represents a tracked page.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Page.StartedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the tate and time for the beginning of the page load.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Page.Id
member.summary:
Gets or sets the unique identifier of a page.
Entries use it to refer the parent page.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Page.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Page.PageTimings
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed timing info about page load.

member.name: T:HarSharp.PageTimings
member.summary:
Describes timings for various events (states) fired during the page load.
All times are specified in milliseconds.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PageTimings.OnContentLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds since page load started when the content is loaded.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PageTimings.OnLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds since page load started when the page is loaded.

member.name: T:HarSharp.PostData
member.summary: Describes posted data.

member.name: M:HarSharp.PostData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PostData.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the mime type of posted data.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PostData.Params
member.summary: Gets the list of posted parameters (in case of URL encoded parameters).

member.name: P:HarSharp.PostData.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the plain text posted data.

member.name: T:HarSharp.PostDataParameter
member.summary: Represents a posted data.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PostDataParameter.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets name of a posted file.

member.name: P:HarSharp.PostDataParameter.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets content type of a posted file.

member.name: T:HarSharp.QueryStringParameter
member.summary: Represents a query string parameter.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Request
member.summary: Contains detailed info about performed request.

member.name: M:HarSharp.Request.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Request.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method (GET, POST, ...).

member.name: P:HarSharp.Request.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute URL (fragments are not included).

member.name: P:HarSharp.Request.QueryString
member.summary: Gets the list of query parameter objects.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Request.PostData
member.summary: Gets or sets the posted data info.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Response
member.summary: Contains detailed info about the response.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Response.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Response.StatusText
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status description.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Response.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the details about the response body.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Response.RedirectUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the redirection target URL from the Location response header.

member.name: T:HarSharp.Timings
member.summary:
Describes various phases within request-response round trip.
All times are specified in milliseconds.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Blocked
member.summary: Gets or sets the time spent in a queue waiting for a network connection.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Dns
member.summary: Gets or sets the DNS resolution time. The time required to resolve a host name.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Connect
member.summary: Gets or sets the time required to create TCP connection.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Send
member.summary: Gets or sets the time required to send HTTP request to the server.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Wait
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting for a response from the server.

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Receive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time required to read entire response from the server (or cache).

member.name: P:HarSharp.Timings.Ssl
member.summary: Gets or sets the time required for SSL/TLS negotiation.
